definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: He becomes more and more interested in exploring the possibility of a "non-dancing" body.
sentences.chinese: 他对“非舞蹈化”肢体的可能性愈加关注。

sentences.english: With the impounding of Three Gorges Project, study on this problem became urgent.
sentences.chinese: 随着三峡工程完工蓄水，这方面的研究显得愈加迫切。

sentences.english: As time went on,his intelligence rayed out more brightly.
sentences.chinese: 随着时间的推移，他的智慧之光愈加灿烂夺目。

sentences.english: With the accelerated pace of economic globalization, Matthew Effect obviously show.
sentences.chinese: 随着经济全球化步伐加快，马太效应愈加明显。

sentences.english: The more blood that is offered to the Gods, the more readily they are appeased .
sentences.chinese: 用于献祭鲜血愈多，诸神便会愈加愉悦。

sentences.english: But I think it's more difficult for Chinese students to study because of The College Entrance Examination.
sentences.chinese: 但我以为由于高考，中国的青年们会愈加难学。

sentences.english: They should have paid more attention to quality.
sentences.chinese: 他们原本应该愈加注重质量。

sentences.english: International tax avoidance hurts heavily the tax interests of some countries and reduces their financial income.
sentences.chinese: 国际避税和反避税的斗争愈加激烈。

sentences.english: Sandstorms are becoming increasingly severe in northern China because of land degradation.
sentences.chinese: 由于土地退化，沙尘暴在中国北方变得愈加严重。

sentences.english: The technology to irradiate food has been around for the better part of a century.
sentences.chinese: 在大半个世纪以来辐照食品的技术变得愈加突出。

sentences.english: Street protests gradually became noisier, and clashes with police more violent.
sentences.chinese: 街头抗议逐步激化，与警察的对抗也愈加暴力。

sentences.english: The field is of growing interest to public-and private-sector managers.
sentences.chinese: 公众和私人产业的经理人士愈加关注该领域。

sentences.english: Enlisted soldier's experience lets I more profound experience army discipline the significance.
sentences.chinese: 学兵地阅历让本人愈加深入地领会到戎行规律地意义。

sentences.english: With climate change, the problem will become worsened.
sentences.chinese: 随着气候变化，这种情况将愈加恶化。

sentences.english: This war has gone through blood and fire, they increasingly aspire to live in peace.
sentences.chinese: 经历了这场血与火的战争，他们对和平生活愈加向往。

definition: increasingly/more and more/ever more/all the more
to progress (or increase, change etc) day by day/more (or better etc) with each passing day
day by day/more and more/increasingly/more and more with each passing day
(increasing) day by day/(more critical) with every passing day/gradually
to become more and more/to gradually become
to increase steadily/to grow with each passing day
